alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Talbot (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 11:17PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sussex, southwestern Kent, east central Talbot and Caroline Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harmony, or 8 miles east of Easton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Easton, Denton, Harrington, Federalsburg, Greensboro, Ridgely, Preston, Goldsboro, Woodside, Viola, Smithville, Hazlettville, Agner, Sandtown, Andrewsville, Tanyard, Harmony, Matthews, Griffin and Cordova. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
